assessment_item.title: 7R3M95-Q1பூஞ்சைகளை தனிமைப்படுத்த  பயன்படுத்தப்படும ஊடகம் எது?
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

பூஞ்சைகளை தனிமைப்படுத்த  பயன்படுத்தப்படும ஊடகம் எது?

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

திட ஊடகம்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:2567"},{"text":"

SDA  அகார்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:2568"},{"text":"

EMB அகார்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:2578"},{"text":"

இரத்த அகார்
